mapper.insert: insert into products_table (productCategory, productName, productWriter, productPw, productContents, productPrice, productCreatedDate, productFileName) values (#{productCategory}, #{productName}, #{productWriter}, #{productPw}, #{productContents}, #{productPrice}, now(), #{productFileName})
mapper.select: select * from products_table order by id desc
update products_table set productHits=productHits+1 where id=#{id}
select * from products_table where ${type} like concat('%', #{q}, '%') order by id desc;
